column4: Question:  Since upgrading from 7.04 to 7.10 -- seems Java is wonky.  I can't get Azureus to work (which is Java-based) and can't use a java-based game (Tickettoride).
Question:  Since upgrading from 7.04 to 7.10 -- seems Java was somewhat clobbered.  I can't get Azureus to work (which is Java-based) and can't use a java-based game (Tickettoride).
I had that problem too. Try downloading jdk (which will include jre) from sun.java.com and building it from source. You'll get a bin file that you have to chmod +x, then ./thatbinfile
